Designed to fit all mattress depths with all-around deep pocket elastic to automatically pull excess barrier material far under the mattress. When it is time to wash your mattress protector, simply toss it into the washing machine, wash with cool water, and dry. 100% Money Back Guarantee. American Pillowcase stands behind its products. You can return any defective product hassle-free.

entry.title: 120 Standard Size 100% Cotton White T220 Percale Wholesale Bulk Pillowcases for Tie-Dying, Silk Screening, Hotels, Crafts, Camps, Parties, Physical Therapy
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type: Pillowcase
Price: 365.65

American Pillowcase is bringing you its 100% luxury Egyptian Cotton made from long staple yarns. This Percale textile is a classic one-over-one-under weave which makes the fabric cool and crisp to touch. This breathable yet medium weight material keeps you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. High thread count does not mean better quality or comfort, but this 220 count is perfect for maximum comfort and durability. Even for those with sensitive skin. The hypoallergenic qualities will reduce allergens but still showcases a smooth finish for a satin-like surface and luminous sheen. The hems will help prevent falling apart as extra stitches have been added to ensure a long-lasting product.

Includes: 120 Standard Size Pillow Cases - fits 20"x 26"

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with these American Pillowcase Pillowcases. These pillowcases are made of 100% Egyptian cotton with a breathable, crisp Percale weave comparable to those found in 5-star hotels around the globe.

220 Thread Count Percale Egyption Cotton

Our percale weave cotton pillowcases are produced using a one over one under pattern, creating a tight weave that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability.

Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 200-400 are known for a crisp, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture. Percale linens resist pilling. These linens will develop a softer feel with every washing.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton percale pillowcases in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. A gentle wash cycle with a cold temperature setting, and a mild detergent is recommended. Quality, pH balanced detergents are best when washing fine cotton linens. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens.

Removing cotton pillowcases promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove pillowcases while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton pillowcases. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.

entry.title: Wholesale box of 120 Pillowcases. Standard Size 4" Hems, 300 Thread Count 100% Long Staple Egyptian Cotton
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 390.92

100% long staple cotton is breathable to keep you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. 300 thread count is perfect for maximum comfort and durability. This is the exact fabric I sold to 5-star luxury hotels of years. Higher thread count or heavier fabric does not mean better quality or comfort. Textile experts: the construction is 173x120 using 60 compact yarns in both the warp and the weft - it doesn't get any better. Hypoallergenic will reduce allergens. Sateen finish for a smooth surface and luminous sheen. Double stitched seams for quality and durability. Perfectly covers your pillow with enough overhang to not see the pillow or you can tuck back into the pillow for a cleaner look. Easy care - wash in warm water, dry on medium heat, and take out of the dryer as soon as they are done, or just before they are fully dry. If you are at all unsatisfied, simply let us know and you will receive a full refund - no questions asked! Includes: 10 - Dozen pillowcases with 4” hem

entry.title: College Colors Sheets and Pillowcases, 100% Brushed Microfiber, Hypoallergenic, Soft, Stain-, Fade- and Wrinkle-Resistant - Pick One
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 6.42 - 21.00 (44 variants)

Add some luxurious comfort to your dorm room with this American Pillowcase Microfiber Flat Sheet. With thousands of possible color combinations, you're sure to find the perfect color scheme to express your school spirit. These sheets are made of 100% double brushed Microfiber for that silky smooth, peach-fuzz feel. Comparable to 5-star hotel materials, these breathable linens are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The stylish colors are great for any season; they'll keep you cool on those hot summer nights, and warm in the darkest of winters. The durable construction of these sheets ensure they're long-lasting and will maintain their stain, fade, and wrinkle resistant qualities wash after wash.

Includes: 1 72"x104" Flat Sheet

College Color Flat Sheet

Add some style to your dorm room with these American Pillowcase College Color Sheets. Fully express yourself with thousands of possible color combinations. These sheets are made of 100% double brushed Microfiber for that silky smooth, peach-fuzz feel.

Durable Quality; Built Tough

These durable sheets are long-lasting and affordable. Their lightweight, yet long lasting material is perfect for those with allergies. These breathable sheets are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The microfiber material helps reduce allergy reaction and respiratory irritation.  When paired with regular washings, these sheets are sure to meet those hypoallergenic needs.

Care Instructions

When it is time to wash your microfiber sheets, simply toss them into an ordinary washing machine with hot or warm water and mild detergent. Washing at a warmer temperature allows the microfibers to expand, releasing trapped dirt and micro particles.

Air dry is best for these products since microfiber dries relatively quickly. If you do need to use a dryer, set it on low or no heat.
  • Ultra Soft, Wrinkle-free 1500 Brushed Microfiber
  • Maryland, Boston College
  • 72"x104" FLAT SHEET DORM TWIN XL. Extra large, do not come untucked
  • SILKY SMOOTH peach-fuzz feel, comfortable all year round
  • EASY TO MAINTAIN AND WRINKLE FREE Machine washable and wrinkle free.
  • QUALITY GUARANTEED. Simply return for a full refund in not completely satidfied

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with American Pillowcase Microfiber Bed Sheets. These sheets are made of 100% double brushed Microfiber for that silky smooth, peach-fuzz feel. Comparable to 5-star hotel materials, these breathable sheets are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The stylish sheets are great for any season; they'll keep you cool on those hot summer nights, and warm in the darkest of winters. The durable linens are long-lasting and will maintain their HIGH-QUALITY wash after wash; keeping their stain, fade, and wrinkles resistant qualities.

Includes: A 54 x 75 Inch Full Microfiber Fitted Sheet with Deep 18 Inch Pockets

Microfiber Fitted Sheets

These fitted sheets have been pre-shrunk, with 18-inch pockets deep enough to easily install over your mattress without worry of it slipping up. To help ensure the fitted sheets stay put, elastic is installed all the way around the edges of the sheets, rather than just in the corners. Thanks to the expert finishing, the fabric's silky softness and smoothness is the perfect addition to your bedroom decor.

Durable Quality; Built Tough

These durable sheets are long-lasting and affordable. Their lightweight, yet long lasting material is perfect for those with allergies. These breathable sheets are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The microfiber material helps reduce allergy reaction and respiratory irritation. When paired with regular washings, these sheets are sure to meet those hypoallergenic needs.





Wrinkle and Stain Resistant

This material is processed in a way that makes this durable fabric maintain their overall brightness and shape for longer periods of time. Additionally, this helps the linens stay wrinkle free and let you enjoy a smooth finish.

The tight weave of these microfibers prevents liquids from soaking in immediately, helping keep these fabrics stain resistant. Quickly clean up your spill before it has a chance to soak in and your sheet will remain stain free.

Care Instructions

When it is time to wash your pre-shrunk sheets, simply toss them into an ordinary washing machine with hot or warm water with mild detergent. Washing at a warmer temperature allows the microfibers to expand, releasing trapped dirt and micro particles.

Air dry is best for these products since microfiber dries relatively quickly. If you do need to use a dryer, set it on low or no heat.

Care Instructions

When it is time to wash your microfiber pillowcases, simply toss them into an ordinary washing machine with hot or warm water and mild detergent. Washing at a warmer temperature allows the microfibers to expand, releasing trapped dirt and micro particles.

Air dry is best for these products since microfiber dries relatively quickly. If you do need to use a dryer, set it on low or no heat.
  • Ultra Soft, Wrinkle-free 1500 Brushed Microfiber
  • Maryland ,LSU, Arizona State, Michigan
  • PILLOWCASE Set, Standard Size 21"x30" , Quantity 2
  • A DIFFERENCE YOU CAN FEEL Brushed microfiber fabric gives a silky smooth, peach-fuzz feel
  • EASY TO MAINTAIN AND WRINKLE FREE Machine washable and fast drying
  • VIVID COLORS, FADE RESISTANT, HYPOALLERGENIC

entry.title: 100% Egyptian Cotton, 540 Thread Count 2 Pack Striped Standard Size Pillowcases - 4 Colors with Wrinkle Guard to Choose from - fits 20x26 (Color: Ivory)
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 18.51 - 18.60 (2 variants)

In response to repeated requests from its Amazon customers, American Pillowcase proudly introduces a high-quality, luxuriously soft set of linens that are RELAXATION READY the moment they come out of the dryer. No detail was overlooked in the careful crafting of these 540 thread count striped linens. The 100% EGYPTIAN COTTON fabric is woven using fine yarns, so although it is a high thread count, it is medium weight and perfect for use on warm or cool nights. 100% cotton fibers are ideal for those with sensitive skin as well as comfort and breath-ability. The fabric is expertly finished to ensure its SILKY SOFTNESS, LUSTROUS SHEEN, and WRINKLE RESISTANCE. We have added more stitches to the hems than any other competitor, ensuring the hems never fall apart. The hypoallergenic qualities will reduce allergens but still showcases a smooth finish for a satin-like surface and luminous sheen.

Package Includes: Two standard pillowcases - 21" x 32" - Fits a standard-sized 20” x 26” pillow

Luxury Striped Linens

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with this American Pillowcase silky weave linen set. These items use proprietary processing to limit wrinkling out of the dryer to make this product perfect for any bed in your home.

High Thread Count Egyption Cotton

Our authentic 540 thread count cotton linens are produced using long staple yarns that pairs long lasting beauty with exceptional strength and durability.
Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 540 are known for a ultra soft, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture. Cotton sheets resist pilling, especially in thread counts of 400 or more. These sheets will develop a softer feel with every washing.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton sheets in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. Gently wash with warm water and a standard detergent. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens.
Removing cotton sheets promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove sheets while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton sheets. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.
  • 100% Egyptian Cotton - Luxuriously-long Staple Cotton Yarns Make These Pillowcases Incredibly Soft and Durable
  • MEASUREMENTS: STANDARD PILLOWCASES - 21" x 32" - Fits a standard-sized 20” x 26” pillow. Confirm pillow size before ordering. Set of 2 pillowcases included. Bag closure.
  • A SUMPTUOUS SLEEPING EXPERIENCE THAT WON’T BREAK THE BANK - tested better than all major brands for softness, durability, comfort, wrinkle resistance, and beauty at 50% less than department store prices
  • WRINKLE RESISTANT - Eco-friendly proprietary processing to limit wrinkling out of the dryer make this product perfect for any bed in your home
  • EASY CARE & PRESHRUNK FOR A PERFECT FIT - Machine wash on cold. Tumble dry on low. Do not use bleach or softeners. Preshrunk for a perfectly snug fit on your pillow.
  • MATCHING DUVET COVER AND SHEETS SOLD SEPARATELY - Purchase a matching duvet cover with your pillowcases for a significant discount! See details below under Special Offers and Product Promotions, or click on the Sold by American Pillowcase link below.

entry.title: Crib Mattress Encasement
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type: Misc.
Price: 19.45

Sleep in peace with the American Pillowcase Crib Mattress Protector. Use the mattress protector on a crib mattress to safeguard from dust mites, bacteria, germs, and allergens to keep your baby healthy as they sleep. Waterproof, engineered membrane backing allows the mattress protector to repel liquids while breathability allows sweat and vapor to pass. The unique terry surface increases comfort and significantly lessens noise. If your child suffers from eczema, rhinitis, asthma, allergies, or snoring, the American Pillowcase Mattress Protector can help your precious little one get a more restful night's sleep.

Includes: 1 Crib Mattress Encasement

Crib Mattress Encasement

These are waterproof, comfortable, absorbent, affordable, breathable and quiet. Made with polyurethane backing to repel liquids and a terry surface to absorb moisture. Terry makes these the most comfortable on the market and likely the quietest. Designed to be simple to use, wash, and dry.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q. Does this encase the whole mattress A. Yes this is an encasement with a zipper.

Q. What are these made of? A. The protector itself is a thin, cotton terry layer with a breathable polyurethane membrane barrier back. Our mattress protector is phthalate, vinyl and PVC free.

Q. Are these noisy or plasticy sounding? A. These are neither noisy nor plastic sounding. I can't even tell that they are on. Great product!

Q. Are these urine proof? A. Absolutely, they are.

Q. Do these prevent bedbugs? A. Yes this protector is impenetrable by bed bugs and encases the whole mattress.

Care Instructions

A normal wash cycle with a warm temperature setting is recommended. When drying, also use a warm setting. Do not bleach.
  • cotton
  • WATERPROOF, HYPOALLERGENIC AND VINYL FREE – Protects from dust mites, bacteria, germs, bed bugs, and more. Helps with eczema, rhinitis, asthma and snoring.
  • COMFORTABLE, BREATHABLE, AND LESS NOISE – Engineered membrane backing repels liquids but breathes allowing sweat and vapor to pass. Unique terry surface increases comfort and significantly lessens noise.
  • ZIPPERED ENCASEMENT STYLE - Designed to fit all mattress depths with all-around protection
  • CRIB SIZE – Fits all standard crib mattresses (approx. 28 x 52 x 5.5 inches), Quantity 1
  • AFFORDABLE AND GUARANTEED – Given the quality you will not find a less expensive protector. Full 10-year Warranty means these will likely outlast your mattress. And if for any reason you are not 100% satisfied, return for a full refund.

entry.title: American Pillowcase 100% Brushed Microfiber Fitted Sheet, Medium Pocket, White - Pick Size
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 11.97 - 15.45 (5 variants)

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with American Pillowcase Microfiber Bed Sheets. These sheets are made of 100% double brushed Microfiber for that silky smooth, peach-fuzz feel. Comparable to 5-star hotel materials, these breathable sheets are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The stylish sheets are great for any season; they'll keep you cool on hot summer nights, and warm in the darkest of winters. The durable linens are long-lasting and will maintain their HIGH-QUALITY wash after wash; keeping their stain-, fade-, and wrinkle-resistant qualities.



Includes: One Microfiber Fitted Sheet with Medium 12 Inch Pockets



Microfiber Fitted Sheets



These fitted sheets have been pre-shrunk, with 12-inch pockets deep enough to easily install over your mattress without worry of it slipping up. To help ensure the fitted sheets stay put, elastic is installed all the way around the edges of the sheets, rather than just in the corners. Thanks to the expert finishing, the fabric's silky softness and smoothness is the perfect addition to your bedroom decor.



Durable Quality; Built Tough



These durable sheets are long-lasting and affordable. Their lightweight, yet long lasting material is perfect for those with allergies. These breathable sheets are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The microfiber material helps reduce allergy reaction and respiratory irritation. When paired with regular washings, these sheets are sure to meet those hypoallergenic needs.



Wrinkle- and Stain-Resistant



This material is processed in a way that makes this durable fabric maintain their overall brightness and shape for longer periods of time. Additionally, this helps the linens stay wrinkle free and let you enjoy a smooth finish.



The tight weave of these microfibers prevents liquids from soaking in immediately, helping keep these fabrics stain resistant. Quickly clean up your spill before it has a chance to soak in and your sheet will remain stain free.



Care Instructions



When it is time to wash your pre-shrunk sheets, simply toss them into an ordinary washing machine with hot or warm water with mild detergent.  Washing at a warmer temperature allows the microfibers to expand, releasing trapped dirt and micro particles.



Air dry is best for these products since microfiber dries relatively quickly.  If you do need to use a dryer, set it on low or no heat.




  • ONE FITTED SHEET, 12" pockets, Qty 1, White

  • BRIGHT, VIBRANT COLORS - Matching Flat Sheets and Pillowcases sold separately

  • SOFT, BREATHABLE, LIGHTWEIGHT - Cool in the Summer and warm in the Winter

  • WRINKLE, FADE, STAIN RESISTANT - No ironing needed

  • EASY CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Wash separately. Do not bleach or use fabric softener. Quick Drying

entry.title: Body Pillowcase Pillow Cover 20 x 54, 100% Brushed Microfiber, Body Pillow Cover, (Envelope Closure, Gray)
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 11.19

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with this American Pillowcase Microfiber Body Pillowcase. These pillow cases are made of 100% double brushed Microfiber for that silky smooth, peach-fuzz feel. Comparable to 5-star hotel materials, these breathable cases are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The stylish pillowcases are great for any season; they'll keep you cool on those hot summer nights, and warm in the darkest of winters. These durable pillow covers are long-lasting and affordable. The internal flap ensures that your body pillow will not slide out.

Includes: 1 - 21"x54" Envelope closure pillowcase

Envelope Closure Body Pillowcases

These 21"x54" envelope closure pillowcases are made from very nice, high-quality brushed microfiber. They are soft, wrinkle-free, stain resistant, and lightweight. The fabric is brushed giving it that peach-fuzz feel that makes microfiber so smooth and silky. This microfiber fabric is long-lasting and easy to wash and dry.

This material is processed in a way that ensures it will maintain its overall brightness and shape for a longer period of time.  Additionally, this helps the cases stay wrinkle free and lets you enjoy a smooth finish.
The tight weave of these microfibers prevents liquids from soaking in immediately, helping keep these fabrics stain resistant.  Quickly clean up your spill before it has a chance to soak in and your case will remain stain free.

Durable Quality; Built Tough

The durable pillow covers are long-lasting and will maintain their HIGH-QUALITY properties wash after wash; keeping its stain, fade, and wrinkle resistant qualities. They are lightweight, yet long lasting. This material is perfect for those with allergies.  The microfiber material helps reduce allergy reaction and respiratory irritation.  When paired with regular washings, these pillow cases are sure to meet those hypoallergenic needs.

Care Instructions

When it is time to wash your pre-shrunk microfiber pillowcases, simply toss them into an ordinary washing machine with hot or warm water with mild detergent. Washing at a warmer temperature allows the microfibers to expand, releasing trapped dirt and micro particles.

Air dry is best for these products since microfiber dries relatively quickly. If you do need to use a dryer, set it on low or no heat.

entry.title: American Pillowcase Egyptian Cotton Hemstitch Dinner Napkins - Pick Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type: Home
Price: 36.93 - 975.00 (2 variants)

These are beautiful, 100% long staple Egyptian cotton napkins. Perfect for elegant dinner parties or everyday use. These are sold to hotels and restaurants throughout the world and are made to withstand many washings in a commercial laundry, so they should last a long time in your home. Great for all weddings and dinner parties. In most cases these are more affordable than renting.

Hemstitch Dinner Napkins 20"x 20"

Own these superior quality cotton napkins for less than you can rent them. Our elegant napkins are a perfect addition to your dinner service. Choose from Hemstitch or Satin Band knowing you’re getting beautiful, durable, long lasting napkins.

Beautiful Egyptian Cotton

The beautiful Egyptian cotton used in these napkins will ensure lasting beauty and quality. These napkins come slightly starched from the factory, this allows them to be cut and sewn perfectly. We recommend they be washed before being used. They will continually get softer with every wash.

Care Instructions

When its time to wash your napkins simply toss them in your washer on a cold setting with a detergent of your choice.

Machine dry on medium heat. Remove your napkins when they are 95% dry and iron slightly for a beautiful crisp finish.
  • 100% COTTON – Nearly all napkins selling online are polyester. These will get softer over time
  • ELEGANT – Beautiful hemstitched, mitered corners, and a linen look will add class to your table
  • AFFORDABLE – Buying is less expensive than renting just once for an event
  • PRE-SHUNK - 20"x20". Unlike most napkins, these are pre-shrunk and will remain square
